Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~gennadyl How does this relate to FAB-12479 ? Is it needed for v1.3 developers? Or should we move to the v1.4 epic?

Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: No, it is task to create chaincode projects.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~gennadyl I've moved to the v1.4 epic. Can you clarify what remains to be done?

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: We're not doing this or planning to in the near future, so closing
